title: Baileywiki Maps Pack
description: Immersive, modular and upgradable battlemaps with advanced Foundry VTT integration featuring optional modules like Multilevel Tokens, Dancing Lights and Parallaxia. Go to Patreon.com/baileywiki/ to support this project, get upgrade content, and download original map files.
author: Baileywiki
